00001 //  PlainNode.h
00002 //  Header file for the PlainNode class
00003 //  Stores details for each plain.  Each node is stored in each link of the Plain Linked List
00004 
00005 //  Shay Leary, April 2005
00006 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00007 
00008 #ifndef PLAINNODE_H
00009 #define PLAINNODE_H
00010 
00011 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00012 
00013 #include <iostream>
00014 #include <math.h>
00015 #include <gl/glut.h>
00016 //#include <GL/freeglut.h>
00017 
00018 class PlainNode
00019 {
00020 
00021 public:
00022         PlainNode () {Clear();}
00023     virtual ~PlainNode () {Clear();}
00024 
00025         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 
00027         void  Clear   ();
00028 
00029         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030         //  Get Methods
00031         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032         GLdouble GetType () {return m_type;}
00033         GLdouble GetXstart () {return m_xPlainStart;}
00034         GLdouble GetXend () {return m_xPlainEnd;}
00035         GLdouble GetYstart () {return m_yPlainStart;}
00036         GLdouble GetYend () {return m_yPlainEnd;}
00037         GLdouble GetZstart () {return m_zPlainStart;}
00038         GLdouble GetZend () {return m_zPlainEnd;}
00039 
00040     // Return the address of the link to the next node in the list
00041     PlainNode *GetNext () const {return m_next;}
00042 
00043         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044         //  Set Methods
00045         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046         void SetData(const int tempType,
00047                                  const GLdouble tempXs, const GLdouble tempXe,
00048                                  const GLdouble tempYs, const GLdouble tempYe,
00049                                  const GLdouble tempZs, const GLdouble tempZe);
00050 
00051     // Set the address of the link to the next node in the list
00052     void SetNext (PlainNode *next) {m_next = next;}
00053 
00054 private:
00055     // The address of the next node in the list
00056     PlainNode *m_next;
00057 
00058         // Stores type of plain:
00059         // (0: flat plane)
00060         // (1: incline from z to y)
00061         // (2: incline from x to y)
00062         GLdouble m_type;
00063         
00064 
00065         // stores start and end co-ordinates of plane on x, y and z axis
00066         GLdouble m_xPlainStart, m_xPlainEnd;
00067         GLdouble m_yPlainStart, m_yPlainEnd;
00068         GLdouble m_zPlainStart, m_zPlainEnd;
00069 
00070         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 
00072     // Privatised copy constructor and assignment operator
00073     PlainNode (const PlainNode &newNode) {};
00074     PlainNode &operator = (const PlainNode &newNode) {};
00075 };
